properties.name: forest.mvc.enable-xss
properties.description: 是否开启 xss 攻击拦截.

properties.name: forest.mvc.enable-trace
properties.description: 是否开启日志追踪 traceId.

properties.name: forest.mvc.enable-log
properties.description: 是否开启切面日志记录.

properties.name: forest.mvc.log-ignore-text
properties.description: 日志忽略字段提示文本.
